venue.address_2: ~~Go south till you see the barn and bridge.
venue.phone: Park in the Barn Parking lot.
venue.name: Scantic River RAPIDS

item.description:
Hi Everyone,
Its hot as hell out , and this is a place too cool your azz..
not doing anything in the hot sun but relaxing..sorry i cancelled the kayak trip..but this is im sure a welcomed replacement from the intense sun and heat..

BRING A FLOAT TUBE OR WHATEVER KIDS FLOAT WITH TO RIDE THE SMALL RAPIDS OVER AND OVER AGAIN, BUT MAKE SURE IT FITS YOU BIGGER BACK END...LOL

We recenty did this as a group and really didnt need any floats..but why not get something to play in the water with...

This event is also listed on my *FOREVER YOUNG* site with other RSVP's

Bring some chairs, bug spray, food, bug juice, and be ready for a splash.

YOU CAN EVEN GO TO THE JAZZ FEAST THAT WHEN IT GETS COOLER OUT...I MIGHT..

Hi Everyone,
i was really tired last night when i cancelled and re started a few events..
I relally find these CLICK on a time fields a pain, and when i copy and paste events there is a legacy of data that comes along sometimes i just dont nootice it and would rather physically write in some of this info..

ok
ITS MEET NEAR 12:00-12:30 NOON SATURDAY...WHEN ITS THE HOTTEST OUT..
SINCE THIS IS A PLACE TO MEET AND RELAX, WE WILL BE HERE TILL ITS COOLER IN THE AFTERNOON..
THEN IT WILL BE COOL ENOUGH FOR THE JAZZ FEAST..OR IF NOT, JUST STAY HERE...



Description:
DIRECTIONS:
From Interstate 91 to Parking lot

Take Exit 47 East. Go eastbound 2.7 miles on RT-190 (Hazard Avenue) from Enfield to Hazardville.

At intersection of RT-190 and North/South Maple (RT 192)

turn right (South) onto South Maple. GO DOWN THE SMALL HILL
LOOK FOR THE BRIDGE

Parking is at the barn on the right located right before the bridge. OR DIRECTLY AFTER THE BRIDGE...

From Interstate 84 via RT-190 to Parking and HQ: 1: Take the RT-190 West Exit and follow RT-190 West through Stafford Springs and Somers to Hazardville (Intersection R-190 and RT-192).
2: At stoplight, turn left on to South Maple.
3: Parking is at the barn located by the bridge.

apx 1 - 100 South Maple FOR GPS USERS, Hazardville (Enfield) ct 06082 OR (Just follow the directions above).

OK WE WILL BE NEAR THE WATER OR CLOSE ENOUGH, BUT LOOK FOR THE ORANGE 6 FOOT TALL POLE...THATS MY IDENTIFIER.. AND YELLOW SLOW ADULTS AT PLAY SIGN
see you there if you are interested...
al-r
item.how_to_find_us: Blue Toyota Avalon Orange Traffic Cones, at BARN or BRIDGE/ORANGE POLE AT RIver

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: Float Device and Barbie-q event on the scantic river , NO KAYAKS..
